column4: Hey everyone.  I just set up warty on my inspiron 1100 (dell notebook) and the screen has a black border about two inches thick on all sides.  How can I fix this?
you've played with the monitors settings physically?
I dont see a way to do that.  I won't let me change the resolution from 640x480.
ahh... /etc/X11/XF86Config-4 ... remove all instances of "640x480"... I usually remove all below 1024x768 to give it a convincing prod  :)
